meanings.sent1: The efficacious treatment quickly healed the patient's wounds.
meanings.sent2: Her efficacious strategy led the team to victory.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand was so efficacious that it made things disappear for real!
meanings.sent4: The artist's brushstrokes were so efficacious that they seemed to bring the painting to life.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's powers were so efficacious that they saved the city from destruction.
